flawed_nl_solution:
Jan was 2 years older than Cindy who was 5 so 2+5 = <<2+5=7>>7 years old
Marica was twice as old as Jan so 2*7 = <<2*7=41>>41 years old
Greg was 2 years older than Marcia who was 41 so 2+41 = <<2+41=43>>43 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
